modmenu.descriptionTranslation.hoshikima: Hoshikima adds a versatile chain mining system and other useful features to make your survival experience more efficient.
config.hoshikima.title: Configuration
config.hoshikima.restart_required: Configuration changes require restart to take full effect.
config.hoshikima.chain.mine.enable.toolt: Turning this option off will take effect on the next launch.
config.hoshikima.chain.mine.mode.one.too: Shapeless - The chain mining will follow the natural shape of connected blocks, mining all similar blocks adjacent to each other.
config.hoshikima.chain.mine.mode.two.too: Single Block Tunnel - Mines a straight, one-block wide tunnel in the direction you are looking.
config.hoshikima.chain.mine.mode.three.t: Double Block Tunnel - Mines a straight, two-block wide tunnel in the direction you are looking.
config.hoshikima.chain.mine.mode.four.to: Grid Excavation - Excavates a 3x3 tune of blocks in a straight line.
config.hoshikima.chain.mine.exp.gather.t: When enabled, experience orbs dropped by mined blocks will be automatically collected by the tool and applied later.
config.hoshikima.chain.mine.color.toolti: Sets the color of the preview line that shows which blocks will be mined.
config.hoshikima.chain.mine.disable.deep: When enabled, the preview line will always be rendered, even if it is behind other blocks.
The maximum number of air blocks to skip in a single chain mine operation. Useful for ignoring small gaps.
The total number of air blocks that can be skipped across all chained mining operations.
config.hoshikima.chain.mine.tool.save.to: The minimum durability a tool must have to be used for chained mining. Prevents tools from breaking mid-chain.
config.hoshikima.chain.mine.limit.toolti: The maximum number of blocks that can be mined in a single chain mine operation.(Try to scroll mouse?)
config.hoshikima.chain.mine.limit.min: Are you sure this is chain mine?
config.hoshikima.chain.mine.hud.way.tool: This option switches the way the HUD is displayed.
config.hoshikima.category.items.tooltip: Configure the registration of mod items.
config.hoshikima.category.features.toolt: Configure and adjust the features within the mod.
datapack.hoshikima.name: Raw Ore Block Smelting Recipe
